summary:
Headline:  
Adobe delivered a solid Q2 with total revenue up 9% year-over-year, driven by strong subscription growth and improved profitability. The company reaffirmed full-year guidance and expects a slight improvement in operating margin.

Growth & revenue drivers:  
- Total revenue increased 9% YoY.  
- Digital Media Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) grew by double digits.  
- Subscription revenue remains the primary growth engine, led by Creative Cloud and Document Cloud segments.

Margins / profitability:  
- Gross margin improved by 80 basis points, benefiting from pricing optimization and enhanced cloud efficiency.  
- Operating margin expected to improve slightly compared to prior outlook.

Guidance & outlook:  
- Full-year guidance reaffirmed.  
- Operating margin now expected to improve modestly versus previous expectations.

Risks / watchpoints:  
- No specific risks or headwinds mentioned in the remarks.  
- Monitor execution on pricing and cloud efficiency initiatives to sustain margin gains.
